problem: ZIP files in Google Drive folder not being vectorized to Supabase
solution: Add ZIP detection, decompression, and file routing to existing workflow

execution_steps.action: Edit FileType node - Add 6th output for ZIP
execution_steps.details: Add condition: mimeType contains 'zip' OR fileName ends with '.zip'

execution_steps.action: Add Split In Batches node named 'Loop Over Extracted Files'
Add Switch node named 'Route Extracted File'
Connect nodes: FileType[zip] -> Decompress -> Loop -> Route
Connect Route outputs to existing processors
Test with ZIP file from Google Drive folder
